name: Redacted (ThaLazyDog)
description:
Dust off your good ol' Blaster and go slay some goblins! In this action and platformer prototype you progress through a level, gathering scraps to upgrade your arsenal and shooting at whatever comes your way. Wanna blow your enemies to kingdome come with the mighty Bomber? Or suck them into a singularity of infinite gravity with the A:Voider? Then pay  Weaponz N Gadgetz a visit and find a weapon that fits your needs!

Controls(PC):

Movement - WASD

Camera/Aiming - Mouse cursor

Jump - SPACE, press twice for double jump

Interact - E

Shoot - Left Mouse click

Sprint - Left Shift

Weapon Selection Menu - ALT, navigate with mouse cursor

Pause - ESC

Controls(Game Controller):

Movement - Left joystick

Camera/Aiming - Right joystick

Jump - Facebutton Down, press twice for double jump

Interact -Left Shoulder

Shoot -Right Lower Shoulder

Sprint -Left Joystick Button

Weapon Selection Menu - Facebutton Up, navigate with left joystick

Pause - Right special button

Note: The game can be played with a controller but UI elements such as the menu and shop has to be navigated by the mouse cursor!

This is my first ever game jam so feedback is greatly appreciated! And if you have got any crazy weapon ideas be sure to comment below!
